title: Samsung launches 4G smartphone
content:
Hyderabad :  Samsung Electronics unveiled its ‘affordable’ 4G-enabled smartphone, Galaxy J2, in Hyderabad on Thursday. With this launch, the company has expanded its 4G models to 17 so far and about 14 in this year. The phone is priced at Rs 8,490.  

“We have already launched 23 models so far since January this year and the J2 is the 14 model from the 4G stable this year and 17 so far. We feel India is ready for 4G phones and we plan to make this more affordable and relevant,” said Asim Warsi, vice president, marketing, IT and mobile, Samsung India.
